text: Hi all, does anyone know how to disable a Form from automatically filling in text fields from a query string? For example, if I do this: `<https://somedomain/form?firstname=foo&lastname=bar>` the form gets auto populated with these values. I donâ€™t want that behavior

Same thing is happening to me.

I am using the internal name of a custom property to send information over the the user record but this is not happening.
